name: Tree of Efa
description:
Defend the Tree of Efa from the Evil Orcos!

Use the power of the plants to defeat the enemy Orcos from reach the Tree of Efa!

Tree of Efa is a tower defense game made for our thesis and was showcased during ESGS 2016 and APC Merge last April 2017.

What the game includes:

2 Stages

4 Different plants 

Different pathways for the enemies

Made by :

Charlene Altamirano - Lead Programmer

Neil Diaz - Assistant Programmer

Jude Dy - Sounds and Music

Aaron Navarro - Game Design, UI, Tower animations
